All Classes

Class Description
AABB
This class represents a 3 dimensional axis aligned bounding box.
AABBTests  
AmbientLight
class that represents the ambient light of a scene
Camera
Class encapsulating and implementing the functions of a camera in a graphic scene.
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
class that represents a Cylinder in 3d space
CylinderTests
Unit tests for geometries.Cylinder class
DirectionalLight
Class for a directional light source.
Geometries
Class representing a collection of geometric objects to be stored together.
Geometries.Axis  
Geometry
interface to be implemented by all geometries.
GlossyDiffuseTests
Tests for glossy and diffuse functionality.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
Unit tests for renderer.ImageWriter class
IntegrationTest
Integration tests for testing camera to view plane ray creation and their intersection with intersectable objects.
Intersectable
interface to be implemented by all geometries.
Intersectable.GeoPoint
Class representing a point with respect to a geometry it belongs to.
Light
Abstract class as a base for all types of lights in a scene.
LightSource
Interface for underlying functionality of a light source.
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
submission of assignment 4.
Material
Class representing a geometry, used in association with a geometry.
Plane
class that represents a Plane in 3d space
PlaneTests
Unit tests for geometries.Plane class
Point3D
Point3D class is used to represent a point in 3 dimensional cartesian space.
Point3DTests
Unit tests for primitives.Point3D class
PointLight
Class representing a point light.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
Ray
The Ray class is used to represent a mathematical ray stemming at a point p0 in 3 dimensional cartesian space and pointing in a direction 'dir'.
RayTest
Unit tests for primitives.Ray class
RayTracerBase
abstract class which is the base for ray tracing classes it is used to find the color of a view plane pixel from which we casted a ray
RayTracerBasic
child class of RayTracerBase, that is used to determine color of a view plane pixel from which we casted a ray.
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
Renderer class is responsible for generating pixel color map from a graphic scene, using ImageWriter class
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
class that represents a 3D scene
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
class that represents a Sphere in 3d space
SphereTests
Unit tests for geometries.Sphere class
SpotLight
Class representing a spot light light-source.
TeapotTest
Test rendering an image

class that represents a Triangle in 3d space

Tube

Vector
The vector class is used to represent a mathematical vector in the 3 dimentional cartesian space.

Unit tests for primitives.Vector class
